projects.title: WEATHER-APP
projects.description: The WEATHER-APP provides real-time weather updates using data fetched from a weather API. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it offers a simple and responsive interface for users to check weather conditions

projects.title: FILE-SHARE-WEBSITE
projects.description: The File Share Website allows users to securely upload, share, and manage files with ease. Built using the MERN stack, it ensures fast and efficient file handling with a modern, responsive designe

projects.title: MY PORTFOLIO
projects.description: PROTFOLIA is a dynamic portfolio website built using React, designed to showcase personal projects and skills. It offers a seamless and responsive user experience for displaying creative work and professional achievements.

projects.title: VIDEO HUB
projects.description: Video Hub is a dynamic web application built with React, offering seamless video streaming and content management. It provides users with an intuitive interface to explore, watch, and manage their favorite videos efficiently

projects.title: EVENT-MANAGEMENT-WEBSITE
projects.description: The Event Management System is a comprehensive platform built using the MERN stack to streamline event planning and management. It offers user-friendly features for organizing, tracking, and managing events efficiently.

projects.title: FOOD-ORDER -WEBSITE
projects.description: This project is a simple and responsive food order website built using HTML and CSS. It allows users to browse and order meals seamlessly with a clean, user-friendly interface.

projects.title: MORDEN WEBSITE
projects.description: MORDEN WEBSITE is a dynamic and responsive platform created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Designed for modern users, it offers an intuitive and visually engaging experience.
